name: Lane7 London Victoria
address: Zig Zag, 70 Victoria St, London SW1E 6SQ
content_summary:
Next level bowling, mini golf, shuffleboard, beer pong and augmented darts, as well as Victoria’s best kept secret: Play Dirty – a secret basement arcade hall for adults. Welcome to Lane7 London Victoria.

Large group bookings, work socials and big corporate events; you bring the people and we’ll bring the party.

Surprise someone with a Lane7 gift voucher, so they can make memories by enjoying all their best nights out in one.

We’ve turned traditional fairground games into arcade experiences that will leave you blushing.

Same games, new names. Yesterday’s funfair for today’s adults. You’ll find Play Dirty downstairs at Lane7 Victoria.

Yeah we’ve got the best ten pin bowling in the city centre, but what else can you do at Lane7? And why bother? Take a peek at our recommended things to d...
